## 🚀 **PROJECT SHOWCASE: AI IN ACTION**

<div align="center">

### 🏆 **FEATURED AI/ML PROJECTS**

</div >

<table align="center">
<tr>
<td width="50%">

### 🤖 **Conversational AI Chatbot**
**Description:** Intelligent chatbot with a custom "liquid glass" Streamlit UI.  
**Tech Stack:** Python, LangChain, Gemini API, Streamlit, CSS  
**Features:**
- Context-aware responses
- Custom, responsive UI
- Backend API integration

**Status:** ✅ Complete

[![GitHub](https://img.shields.io/badge/GitHub-Code-181717?style=flat&logo=github)](https://github.com/shubshub-bol/Conversational-AI-Chatbot)

### 📈 **Lead Scoring Model**
**Description:** ML model to classify sales prospects as 'High' or 'Low' potential.  
**Tech Stack:** Python, Scikit-learn, Pandas, Matplotlib  
**Features:**
- Sales data analysis
- Classification modeling
- Stakeholder visualization

**Status:** ✅ Complete

[![GitHub](https://img.shields.io/badge/GitHub-Code-181717?style=flat&logo=github)](https://github.com/shubshub-bol/Lead-Scoring-Model)

</td>
<td width="50%">

### 🧠 **Personality Prediction Model**
**Description:** Behavioral trait classification for targeted marketing (99% Acc).  
**Tech Stack:** Python, Scikit-learn, Random Forest, Pandas  
**Features:**
- 99% classification accuracy
- Feature engineering
- Model comparison (LogReg vs. RF)

**Status:** ✅ Model Optimized

[![GitHub](https://img.shields.io/badge/GitHub-Code-181717?style=flat&logo=github)](https://github.com/shubshub-bol/Personality-Prediction-Model)

### ✈️ **Flight Fare Prediction System**
**Description:** Regression model to predict flight fares (0.82 R-squared).  
**Tech Stack:** Python, Scikit-learn, Pandas, Seaborn  
**Features:**
- 0.82 R-squared score
- Complex feature engineering
- Hyperparameter tuning

**Status:** ✅ Model Tuned

[![GitHub](https://img.shields.io/badge/GitHub-Code-181717?style=flat&logo=github)](https://github.com/shubshub-bol/Flight-Fare-Prediction)

</td>
</tr>
</table>
